All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CashRegister
Represents the cash register
Controller
Controller class handles logic and method calls from other classes in integration and model
Discount
Discount class, can reduce price of sale
DiscountDatabase
Discount Database
ErrorMessageHandler
Represents error message displayed to user
ExternalInventorySystem
This class represents the external inventory system
FileLogger
CODE FOR THIS CLASS RE-USED FROM COURSEBOOK Prints log messages to a file.
InvalidAmountException
Exception class for the cases where an invalid amount of items (less than 1) are entered
Item
Item class represents an item sold at the store
ItemDTO
Data transfer object for the Item Class
ItemMissingException
Exception class for the cases where an invalid itemID is entered
LogHandler
Represents error message display to developer
Main
Starts the entire application
Printer
Represents an imaginary external printer
Receipt
Receipt class, will be printed after a sale
Sale
Sale class
SaleLog
SaleLog class, contains all past sales
ServerErrorException
Exception class for the case where the server is not responding
TotalRevenueFileOutput
This class is an observer, every time it is notified, it updates the total revenue and prints it to a log.txt file
TotalRevenueObserver
Interface for an observer of the total revenue of all purchases
TotalRevenueView
Observer class for the total revenue from start to finish of session
View
A place-holder class to represent what would otherwise be the real view and interface
